name: mri_seg_overlap
description: Compute the structural overlap between two segmentation volumes.

inputs.name: Output file
inputs.description: Save detailed overlap report to a JSON file.

inputs.name: Measures
inputs.description: List of measures to compute. Options include: dice, jaccard, voldiff.

inputs.name: Labels
inputs.description: Space-separated list of label values to include.

inputs.name: Label names
inputs.description: Custom label names corresponding to the values specified with the --labels flag.

inputs.name: Label file
inputs.description: Text file specifying the label values to include. Must be in the format of a freesurfer lookup-table.

inputs.name: Segmentation flag
inputs.description: Compute overlap between the major segmentation structures.

inputs.name: Quiet flag
inputs.description: Quiet mode - do not print results to stdout.

output-files.description: Detailed overlap report saved to a JSON file.
output-files.name: Overlap report

author: FreeSurfer Developers
